org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowSslErrorHandler

    Shadow for Handler that puts posted Runnables into a queue instead of sending them to be handled on a separate thread.Runnables that are scheduled to be executed immediately can be triggered by calling idleMainLooper(). todo: add utility method to advance time and trigger execution of Runnables scheduled for a time in the future
